mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE, MEMBER_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_MODIFY_DATE) VALUES(MEMBER_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirthDate}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE FROM member ORDER BY MEMBER_CREATE_DATE DESC) M ) MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
